Control Statement: The organization: a. Determines information security requirements for the information system or information system service in mission/business process planning;b. Determines, documents, and allocates the resources required to protect the information system or information system service as part of its capital planning and investment control process; andc. Establishes a discrete line item for information security in organizational programming and budgeting documentation.
